verbs.description: supreme court rules for businesses over workers in arbitration decision [ARG0: justice] [V: ruled] [ARG1: 5 - 4] [ARGM-TMP: monday] [ARGM-COM: with the court conservative members in the majority] that businesses can force employees to individually use arbitration to resolve disputes ruth bader ginsburg court obama administration ginsburg neil gorsuch supreme court national labor relations board supreme court of canada
